```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(cowplot)
library(magick)
source("./variableSettings.R")

if(filterData){
  fileNamePrefix<-filterPrefix
}

```

# Wormcat category 1 - `r paste0("p",padjVal," lfc",lfcVal)`

```{r wormcat cat1, echo=F}
for(grp in names(contrastNames)){
  grpPathUp=paste0(outPath,"/wormcat/",fileNamePrefix,contrastNames[[grp]],"_up/rgs_fisher_cat1_apv.svg")
  if(file.exists(grpPathUp)){
    fig_svg<-cowplot::ggdraw() + cowplot::draw_image(grpPathUp)
    plot(fig_svg)
    print("\n")
  }
  
  grpPathDown=paste0(outPath,"/wormcat/",fileNamePrefix,contrastNames[[grp]],"_down/rgs_fisher_cat1_apv.svg")
  if(file.exists(grpPathDown)){
    fig_svg<-cowplot::ggdraw() + cowplot::draw_image(grpPathDown)
    plot(fig_svg)
    print("\n")
  }
}
```
